# Generated Cmake Pico project file

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)

set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS ON)

# Initialise pico_sdk from installed location
# (note this can come from environment, CMake cache etc)

# == DO NOT EDIT THE FOLLOWING LINES for the Raspberry Pi Pico VS Code Extension to work ==
if(WIN32)
    set(USERHOME $ENV{USERPROFILE})
else()
    set(USERHOME $ENV{HOME})
endif()
set(sdkVersion 2.2.0)
set(toolchainVersion 14_2_Rel1)
set(picotoolVersion 2.2.0-a4)
set(picoVscode ${USERHOME}/.pico-sdk/cmake/pico-vscode.cmake)
if (EXISTS ${picoVscode})
    include(${picoVscode})
endif()
# ====================================================================================
set(PICO_BOARD pico CACHE STRING "Board type")

# Pull in Raspberry Pi Pico SDK (must be before project)
include(pico_sdk_import.cmake)
# We also need PICO EXTRAS
set(PICO_EXTRAS_PATH ${USERHOME}/pico-extras)	# <==== Change the path to the pico-extras folder here
include(${PICO_EXTRAS_PATH}/external/pico_extras_import.cmake)


project(tetrachorder C CXX ASM)

# Initialise the Raspberry Pi Pico SDK
pico_sdk_init()

# Add executable. Default name is the project name, version 0.1
add_executable(tetrachorder tetrachorder.c
    usb_descriptors.c
    encoder_button.c
    keypad.c
    kbd_events.c
    audio.c
    synth.c
    chord.c
    play.c
    )

pico_set_program_name(tetrachorder "tetrachorder")
pico_set_program_version(tetrachorder "0.1")

# Modify the below lines to enable/disable output over UART/USB
pico_enable_stdio_uart(tetrachorder 1)
pico_enable_stdio_usb(tetrachorder 0)

#define for our example code
target_compile_definitions(tetrachorder PRIVATE
	USE_AUDIO_I2S=1
	PICO_AUDIO_I2S_MONO_INPUT=1
    )

# Add the standard library to the build
target_link_libraries(tetrachorder
        pico_stdlib
        hardware_pio
        tinyusb_device
        tinyusb_board
        pico_audio_i2s
        )

# Add the standard include files to the build
target_include_directories(tetrachorder PRIVATE
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}
)

pico_add_extra_outputs(tetrachorder)
